import React, { Component } from 'react' import {Route} from 'react-router-dom' import MyNavLink from '../../../MyNavLink' import './index.css' export default class Item extends Component { render() { const {productName, description, price, numberInStock, imgURL} = this.props return (

h{productName}

{description}

${price}

Detail
) } }
